body_html:
Thanks a lot @chocolate9624.

Finally, I was able to solve the issue. It looks like none of the drivers that are available on Debian (jessie, jessie-backports, and stretch) can make the GPU work (not my Quadro nor my Tesla). I used the driver that is available on Nvidia's website and it solved the problem.

body:
Thanks a lot @chocolate9624.

Finally, I was able to solve the issue. It looks like none of the drivers that are available on Debian (jessie, jessie-backports, and stretch) can make the GPU work (not my Quadro nor my Tesla). I used the driver that is available on Nvidia's website and it solved the problem.
